SELECT * FROM ( SELECT dbo.fn_codebook('SYS017' , '04') as sign_tp_nm , '04' sign_tp_cd , count(*) AS sign_cnt FROM ( SELECT case when c.sign_f_cd1='N' then c.sign_id1 else case when c.sign_f_cd2='N' then c.sign_id2 else case when c.sign_f_cd3='N' then c.sign_id3 else '결재완료' end end end nowsignid , sign_tp_cd FROM uc_exps_hldy a, ( SELECT appl_month, appl_user FROM uc_exps_hldy_hst GROUP BY appl_month, appl_user ) b, uc_sign_hst c WHERE a.appl_month = b.appl_month AND a.appl_user = b.appl_user AND a.appl_seq = c.sign_hst_id AND c.sign_tp_cd = '04' AND c.sign_prgs_stts_cd IN ('01','02','03') AND ISNULL(rtn_f_cd,'N') = 'N' ) AS XX WHERE 1=1 AND nowsignid = ?
